argument.name: amount
argument.desc: Amount of ship hardware to buy

line.comment: * Gnasirator, 05.03.2012
* If buying upgrades, no sellstation is provided
* script call updated for LU 1.3.5
* Get proper buyamount
* set commands right
* if enough missiles have been autobought, just end task
* if buystations doesn't have enough, just buy as much as possible
* Check if trader already earned enough money to afford his upgrade
* Buy jump drive, regardless of gain. it's important!
* respect total gained
* respect upgrade budget
* check if player can afford the ship hardware
* If player also can't afford to buy the upgrade, reduce buyamount
* replaced by $return
* do if [ENVIRONMENT] != $buystation
* goto label return:
* BUY ware!
* missiles.autobought enhält die automatisch gekaufte Menge an raketen
* aber NUR, wenn die zu kaufende ware auch eine rakete ist
* Only return false if station didn't have enough wares anymore

sval.val: Amount of ship hardware to buy
If buying upgrades, no sellstation is provided
if enough missiles have been autobought, just end task
if buystations doesn't have enough, just buy as much as possible
Check if trader already earned enough money to afford his upgrade
Buy jump drive, regardless of gain. it's important!
check if player can afford the ship hardware
If player also can't afford to buy the upgrade, reduce buyamount
missiles.autobought enhält die automatisch gekaufte Menge an raketen
aber NUR, wenn die zu kaufende ware auch eine rakete ist
Only return false if station didn't have enough wares anymore
